segments.text: Did you need help with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to cancel an account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a problem with your account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t need two different accounts anymore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to do about the money in your account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I transfer it to my remaining account ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll do that for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to withdraw any money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ ll just take me a moment to cancel your account .
segments.speaker: S1
